name: Pathless (gershgames)
description:
We now live in a pathless world.

A generation ago, you used to be able to go to school, get a job. Somewhere in between you got married, bought a house and had kids. You worked until 65 then retired with a pension. There was a well-defined path to follow.

Now, the path is less defined. People need to come up with their own paths.

This is a short game that tries to capture one of those paths.

[Credit to Unity - used most of the content from the 2D sample]
